content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: coal_block
inventory=[{"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 15, "index": 10}, {"type": "acacia_leaves", "quantity": 11, "index": 11}, {"type": "birch_trapdoor", "quantity": 36, "index": 23}, {"type": "netherite_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "golden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 9, "index": 31}, {"type": "orange_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 12, "index": 41}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone", "quantity": 31, "index": 43}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 15, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a coal_block, I need to place 9 coal in a 3x3 square. Therefore, I will start by moving 1 coal from slot 31 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
